articles.content: While the IPL auction 2022 featured several marquee signings for some exorbitant prices, Australia's T20 World Cup-winning captain and former RCB star Aaron Finch went unsold. The 35-year old was not… [+1859 chars]

articles.title: RR Full IPL Squad 2022: With Ashwin, Buttler & Samson, Rajasthan Has A Balanced Side In 2022 IPL | Check Full Squad - ABP Live
articles.description: Rajasthan Royals Full Squad: Check out RR's full squad for IPL 2022 below.
articles.content:
